bibl.title: Observations on a Letter from Apollonios to Chairemon (BGU II 594).
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: Reedition of B.G.U. II, 594, which belongs to the archive of Apollonios from Bakchias. On the back of B.G.U. II, 583 = C. P. Gr. II, 14. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Nikos Litinas, Observations on a Letter from Apollonios to Chairemon (BGU II 594).
Reedition of B.G.U. II, 594, which belongs to the archive of Apollonios from Bakchias. On the back of B.G.U. II, 583 = C. P. Gr. II, 14. - Avec résumé en anglais.
